ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ فَعَلْتُهَآ إِذًا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] فَعَلْتُهَآ [I did it] إِذًۭا [when] وَأَنَا۠ [I] مِنَ [(was) of] ٱلضَّآلِّينَ [those who are astray]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala faAAaltuha ithanwaana mina addalleen

ayahs.textUthmani: فَفَرَرْتُ مِنكُمْ لَمَّا خِفْتُكُمْ فَوَهَبَ لِى رَبِّى حُكْمًا وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَفَرَرْتُ [So I fled] مِنكُمْ [from you] لَمَّا [when] خِفْتُكُمْ [I feared you] فَوَهَبَ [But granted] لِى [to me] رَبِّى [my Lord] حُكْمًۭا [judgment] وَجَعَلَنِى [and made me] مِنَ [of] ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ [the Messengers]
ayahs.transliteration: Fafarartu minkum lamma khiftukumfawahaba lee rabbee hukman wajaAAalanee mina almursaleen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَتِلْكَ نِعْمَةٌ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَىَّ أَنْ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَتِلْكَ [And this] نِعْمَةٌۭ [(is the) favor] تَمُنُّهَا [with which you reproach] عَلَىَّ [[on] me] أَنْ [that] عَبَّدتَّ [you have enslaved] بَنِىٓ [(the) Children of Israel] إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ [(the) Children of Israel]
ayahs.transliteration: Watilka niAAmatun tamunnuha AAalayyaan AAabbadta banee isra-eel

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَا رَبُّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [Firaun said] فِرْعَوْنُ [Firaun said] وَمَا [And what] رَبُّ [(is the) Lord] ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ [(of) the worlds]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala firAAawnu wama rabbu alAAalameen

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبُّ [Lord] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [(of) the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضِ [and the earth] وَمَا [and whatever] بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ [(is) between them] إِن [if] كُنتُم [you (should) be] مُّوقِنِينَ [convinced]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala rabbu assamawatiwal-ardi wama baynahuma in kuntummooqineen

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ لِمَنْ حَوْلَهُۥٓ أَلَا تَسْتَمِعُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] لِمَنْ [to those] حَوْلَهُۥٓ [around him] أَلَا [Do not] تَسْتَمِعُونَ [you hear]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala liman hawlahu alatastamiAAoon

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبُّكُمْ [Your Lord] وَرَبُّ [and (the) Lord] ءَابَآئِكُمُ [(of) your forefathers] ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ [(of) your forefathers]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala rabbukum warabbu aba-ikumual-awwaleen

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمَجْنُونٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] إِنَّ [Indeed] رَسُولَكُمُ [your Messenger] ٱلَّذِىٓ [who] أُرْسِلَ [has been sent] إِلَيْكُمْ [to you] لَمَجْنُونٌۭ [(is) surely mad]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala inna rasoolakumu allatheeorsila ilaykum lamajnoon

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبُّ [Lord] ٱلْمَشْرِقِ [(of) the east] وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ [and the west] وَمَا [and whatever] بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ [(is) between them] إِن [if] كُنتُمْ [you were] تَعْقِلُونَ [(to) reason]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala rabbu almashriqi walmaghribiwama baynahuma in kuntum taAAqiloon

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذْتَ إِلَـٰهًا غَيْرِى لَأَجْعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمَسْجُونِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] لَئِنِ [If] ٱتَّخَذْتَ [you take] إِلَـٰهًا [a god] غَيْرِى [other than me] لَأَجْعَلَنَّكَ [I will surely make you] مِنَ [among] ٱلْمَسْجُونِينَ [those imprisoned]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala la-ini ittakhathta ilahanghayree laajAAalannaka mina almasjooneen

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ أَوَلَوْ جِئْتُكَ بِشَىْءٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] أَوَلَوْ [Even if] جِئْتُكَ [I bring you] بِشَىْءٍۢ [something] مُّبِينٍۢ [manifest]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala awa law ji/tuka bishay-in mubeen

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ فَأْتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] فَأْتِ [Then bring] بِهِۦٓ [it] إِن [if] كُنتَ [you are] مِنَ [of] ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ [the truthful]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala fa/ti bihi in kunta mina assadiqeen

ayahs.textUthmani: فَأَلْقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ ثُعْبَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَأَلْقَىٰ [So he threw] عَصَاهُ [his staff] فَإِذَا [and behold] هِىَ [It] ثُعْبَانٌۭ [(was) a serpent] مُّبِينٌۭ [manifest]
ayahs.transliteration: Faalqa AAasahu fa-ithahiya thuAAbanun mubeen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيْضَآءُ لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَنَزَعَ [And he drew out] يَدَهُۥ [his hand] فَإِذَا [and behold] هِىَ [It] بَيْضَآءُ [(was) white] لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ [for the observers]
ayahs.transliteration: WanazaAAa yadahu fa-itha hiya baydaolinnathireen

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ لِلْمَلَإِ حَوْلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسَـٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] لِلْمَلَإِ [to the chiefs] حَوْلَهُۥٓ [around him] إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰذَا [this] لَسَـٰحِرٌ [(is) surely a magician] عَلِيمٌۭ [learned]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala lilmala-i hawlahu inna hathalasahirun AAaleem

ayahs.textUthmani: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: يُرِيدُ [He wants] أَن [to] يُخْرِجَكُم [drive you out] مِّنْ [from] أَرْضِكُم [your land] بِسِحْرِهِۦ [by his magic] فَمَاذَا [so what] تَأْمُرُونَ [(do) you advise]
ayahs.transliteration: Yureedu an yukhrijakum min ardikumbisihrihi famatha ta/muroon

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبْعَثْ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَـٰشِرِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالُوٓا۟ [They said] أَرْجِهْ [Postpone him] وَأَخَاهُ [and his brother] وَٱبْعَثْ [and send] فِى [in] ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ [the cities] حَـٰشِرِينَ [gatherers ]
ayahs.transliteration: Qaloo arjih waakhahu wabAAathfee almada-ini hashireen

ayahs.textUthmani: يَأْتُوكَ بِكُلِّ سَحَّارٍ عَلِيمٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: يَأْتُوكَ [They (will) bring to you] بِكُلِّ [every] سَحَّارٍ [magician] عَلِيمٍۢ [learned]
ayahs.transliteration: Ya/tooka bikulli sahharin AAaleem

ayahs.textUthmani: فَجُمِعَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ لِمِيقَـٰتِ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَجُمِعَ [So were assembled] ٱلسَّحَرَةُ [the magicians] لِمِيقَـٰتِ [for (the) appointment] يَوْمٍۢ [(on) a day] مَّعْلُومٍۢ [well-known]
ayahs.transliteration: FajumiAAa assaharatu limeeqatiyawmin maAAloom

ayahs.textUthmani: وَقِيلَ لِلنَّاسِ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّجْتَمِعُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَقِيلَ [And it was said] لِلنَّاسِ [to the people] هَلْ [Will] أَنتُم [you] مُّجْتَمِعُونَ [assemble]
ayahs.transliteration: Waqeela linnasi hal antummujtamiAAoon
